value.title: Implement a secure environment for a database service
value.excerpt: Implement SQL Server-based options for authentication and authorization, as well as Azure options for securing Azure SQL databases. Explore encryption, firewalls and advanced threat protection.

topItems.title: Configure database authentication and authorization
topItems.excerpt: Contrast authentication using Azure Active Directory vs Windows Active Directory vs SQL Server authentication. Implement various security principals and configure permissions.

topItems.title: Protect data in-transit and at rest
topItems.excerpt: Protect data in-transit and at rest

topItems.title: Implement compliance controls for sensitive data
topItems.excerpt: Explore data classification capabilities and degrees of confidentiality. Explore and configure advanced threat protection options, including SQL Injection.

value.title: Introduction to AI technology for business leaders
value.excerpt: This learning path helps business leaders discover and describe the primary concepts of AI, and the transformational impact AI can have in their organization.

topItems.title: Introduction to AI technology
topItems.excerpt: Learn the primary concepts and technologies of AI, and how Microsoft is turning the latest AI into tools, products, and services that organizations can leverage

topItems.title: Examine the Microsoft approach to artificial intelligence
topItems.excerpt: Learn how Microsoft creates products, services, and solutions to help organizations leverage AI. Understand how these technologies relate to business problems.

value.title: Large-Scale Data Processing with Azure Data Lake Storage Gen2
value.excerpt: With this learning path, you'll use Azure Data Lake Storage to process your Big Data efficiently and easily while also being protected by Azure’s host of security features.

topItems.title: Introduction to Azure Data Lake storage
topItems.excerpt: Discover how Data Lake Storage provides a repository where you can upload and store unstructured data bringing new efficiencies to processing big data analytics.

topItems.title: Upload data to Azure Data Lake Storage
topItems.excerpt: Learn about creating an Azure Data Lake Storage account and uploading data to Data Lake Storage Gen 2 through the Azure Storage Explorer.

topItems.title: Secure your Azure Storage account
topItems.excerpt: Learn how Azure Storage provides multilayered security to protect your data with access keys, secure networks, and Advanced Threat Protection monitoring.

value.title: Analyze the sentiment of reviews with Keras
value.excerpt: Keras is a high-level neural networks API, written in Python, that runs on top of other deep learning tools such as TensorFlow. This module uses Keras to build a neural network that scores text, such as user reviews for sentiment.

images.title: Analyze the sentiment of reviews with Keras

value.title: Enable automatic updates in a web application using Azure Functions and SignalR Service
value.excerpt: Update a web app's notification mechanism from polling to push-based architecture with SignalR Service, Azure Cosmos DB and Azure Functions.

value.title: Explore Azure networking services
value.excerpt: Learn about the core networking resources that are available in Azure, such as Virtual Networks, VPN Gateway, and ExpressRoute.

value.title: Explore Azure Storage services
value.excerpt: Learn about the different storage options that are available in Azure Storage.

value.title: Microsoft Azure Well-Architected Framework - Performance efficiency
value.excerpt: Learn how to adjust your capacity based on workload and how to optimize network performance, storage, and database performance.

value.title: Build a bot with QnA Maker and Azure Bot Service
value.excerpt: Learn how to create a bot that answers frequently asked questions.

value.title: Discover sentiment in text with the Text Analytics API
value.excerpt: Learn how to use the Text Analytics API and Azure Functions to discover what your customers are really saying in their feedback about your products or brands.

value.title: Control authentication for your APIs with Azure API Management
value.excerpt: Discover how to protect your APIs from unauthorized use with API keys and client certificate authentication.

value.title: Create a build pipeline with Azure Pipelines
value.excerpt: Set up a continuous integration (CI) pipeline that automates the process of building your application.

value.title: Add conversational intelligence to your apps by using Language Understanding Intelligent Service (LUIS)
value.excerpt: In this module, we'll introduce you to Language Understanding Intelligent Service (LUIS) and show how to build and publish a LUIS model

value.title: Create an Azure Database for PostgreSQL server
value.excerpt: Learn how to create and deploy Azure Database for PostgreSQL for fully managed, enterprise-ready PostgreSQL database services.

value.title: Deploy SQL Server in a virtual machine
value.excerpt: Configure virtual machine sizing, storage, and networking options to ensure adequate performance for your database workloads. Choose and configure appropriate high availability options. Investigate options for migrating existing workloads.

value.title: Describe Azure Databricks
value.excerpt: Describe Azure Databricks

value.title: Describe the identity and access management capabilities of Microsoft 365
value.excerpt: Describe the identity and access management capabilities of Microsoft 365

value.title: Distribute your data globally with Azure Cosmos DB
value.excerpt: Discover the benefits of writing and replicating customized data to regions around the world with Azure Cosmos DB global distribution.

value.title: Enhance your service availability and data locality by using Azure Traffic Manager
value.excerpt: Discover how Azure Traffic Manager provides DNS load balancing for your application to improve the performance and availability of your application.

value.title: Identify security threats with Azure Security Center
value.excerpt: Master securing your Azure workloads with Azure Security Center. In this module, you’ll discover how to detect and respond to threats with Azure Security Center.

value.title: Implement a code workflow in your build pipeline by using Git and GitHub
value.excerpt: Learn along with the Space Game web team the benefits of collaboration through Visual Studio Code and GitHub.

value.title: Improve application scalability and resiliency by using Azure Load Balancer
value.excerpt: In this module, you will learn how to use Azure Load Balancer to distribute traffic between multiple virtual servers or services.

value.title: Introduction to AI technology
value.excerpt: Learn the primary concepts and technologies of AI, and how Microsoft is turning the latest AI into tools, products, and services that organizations can leverage

value.title: Introduction to the Azure Machine Learning SDK
value.excerpt: Azure Machine Learning provides a cloud-based platform for training, deploying, and managing machine learning models.

value.title: Build a containerized web application with Docker
value.excerpt: Learn how to use Docker to build, store, and manage private container images with the Azure Container Registry.

value.title: Introduction to Azure IoT Hub
value.excerpt: University of Oxford

value.title: Introduction to Kubernetes
value.excerpt: Get acquainted with the Kubernetes open-source container-orchestration system for automating application deployment, scaling, and management.

value.title: Introduction to Azure Data Lake storage
value.excerpt: Discover how Data Lake Storage provides a repository where you can upload and store unstructured data bringing new efficiencies to processing big data analytics.

value.title: Keep your virtual machines updated
value.excerpt: Learn to use Azure Update Management to update virtual machines, verify agent connectivity, and use Azure Log Analytics in your cloud environment.

value.title: Manage secrets in your server apps with Azure Key Vault
value.excerpt: Learn how to create an Azure Key Vault to store secret values and how to enable secure access to the vault.
